column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////5 stars mostly because our server (Tina!) realized I was kinda in a rush to get the airport
column2: told me how to get there the fastest way possible
column3: got the check to the table when the food came
column4: and immediately ran it and brought it back
column5: and with boxes. So nice when you're not like hELLOO im gonna miss mah flight cause you cant run a credit card!
